title: the Lightning Champion
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Artorias is the youngest sibling, wielding the elemental power of thunder. He loves to travel around the world and wrecking havoc everywhere, which cause a lot of headache to his older siblings.

abilities.name: Thunder Fury
abilities.details:
Every time Artorias basic attacks or uses Lightning Strike on an enemy hero, he receives a stack of Thunder Fury (maximum 10 stacks). A critical hit will grant him 2 stacks instead.

Each Thunder Fury stack increases his critical chance[/]. Artorias's critical chance can exceed 100%, and excessive critical chance will be converted to critical strike damage[/].

At maximum stacks, Artorias's basic attack or Lightning Strike creates lightning that deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to the target and nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.details:
Artorias fires a blast of lightning in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to all enemies hit (Lightning Strike can critically strike).

In Thunder Dragon form, Lightning Strike has a slightly wider and longer range.

abilities.name: Voltaic Body
abilities.details:
Artorias gains increased [as]attack speed[/] and [ms]movement speed[/] that decays over a short duration.

In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias's basic attacks, Lightning Strike and chained lightning from Thunder Fury also reduce the target's [db]magical resistance[/].

abilities.name: Galvanic Tip
abilities.details:
Artorias leaps to a target direction and fires a lightning bolt at the nearest enemy (prioritising enemy hero), dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) and [db]slowing[/] the target for a short duration.

In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias uses his tail to pierce at a target direction, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to all enemies hit and greatly [db]slowing[/] them down for the same duration.

abilities.name: Storm Breaker
abilities.details:
Artorias transforms into the powerful Thunder Dragon, gaining increased [bf]size[/] and maximum stacks of Thunder Fury for a duration.

While in Thunder Dragon form, Artorias will always critically strike[/] with basic attacks and Lightning Strike. In addition, his critical chance will be converted to bonus critical strike damage[/] instead.

While in Thunder Dragon form, his abilities are enhanced.
